repo_description: üå©Ô∏è Boilerplate for typescript/nodejs on AWS using serverless yml templates with graphQL as the API backed by dynamod & elastic search

schemas.name: schema.graphql
schemas.content:
# source: https://a8noghdsdb.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/default/events
# timestamp: Mon Dec 24 2018 01:01:26 GMT+0530 (India Standard Time)

"""
A date-time string at UTC, such as 2007-12-03T10:15:30Z, compliant with the
`date-time` format outlined in section 5.6 of the RFC 3339 profile of the ISO
8601 standard for representation of dates and times using the Gregorian calendar.
"""
scalar DateTime

type Event {
  id: String!
  name: String!
  description: String!
  addedAt: DateTime!
}

type Mutation {
  createEvent(name: String!, description: String!): Event
  removeProduct(id: String!): Boolean
}

type Query {
  listEvents: [Event]
  viewEvent(id: String!): Event
}
